page.title: 13 Cotton College.
page.content: Cotton College is an independent R.C. boarding school for boys and girls aged 11 to 18 years.The College has existed for well over 200 years and has been in the buildings at Cotton for about 115 years.There are 160 pupils in the school who study for G.C.E."O"and"A" level examinations in a variety of subjects from languages and arts to the sciences.There are 18 teachers and the headmaster is Mr.Hutchings.The pupils play many sports including cricket, tennis,athletics and rugby for which they are coched by one of the staff who is an international player.Other activities include flying with the combined cadet force,judo,rock climbing sailing and similar adventures.The old part of the building dates back to 1620 when it was the home of the Gilberts. There is a C.of E.Church dating back to 1790 and an R.C.Church built in 1848.
